src:
Former 49ers QB Colin Kaepernick celebrates birthday by helping homeless in Oakland

05 Nov 2019, 01:11

OAKLAND, Calif. -- Former 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick celebrated his 32nd birthday by helping the homeless in Oakland.RELATED: Former San Francisco 49er Colin Kaepernick reveals why he became an activistPictures and video were posted on the Instagram account for Kaepernick's Know Your Rights foundation.Kaepernick handed out backpacks and toiletries to the homeless. He also hired a San Francisco food truck to feed people.See more stories about Colin Kaepernick here.
